vimEmulator.title: Hi, I'm miikamenk
vimEmulator.subtitle: Full-Stack Software Developer. Based in Finland
vimEmulator.intro: I love challenging myself and always learning new things. I love vim and linux, because I can customize and optimize my workflow however I like.
vimEmulator.hobbiesIntro: Outside of software, I'm an avid maker and enthusiast of custom electronics. My personal projects frequently involve:
vimEmulator.tryTerminal: Try out this interactive Vim terminal I built and explore the rest of my site!

skills.hardware: Hardware Design: Custom mechanical keyboards, audio gear and other fun electronics projects.
skills.opensource: Open Source: Designing useful programs and tackling fun engineering challenges.
skills.tooling: Tooling: Linux, Vim, and development workflow optimization.
